body.description1: Here you could browse and manage the files which stored in SD Card.
body.description2: The SD Card is either unplug or invalid. Please check SD Card or format it.
body.description3: The SD Card Storage is invalid.
body.description4: The SD Card Storage is protected.
body.performance: The throughput of the SD Card on your camera is not currently enough for recording. We suggest you to reformat the SD Card or replace it with a higher class one.
body.sdNote: Please note that there is no SD Card plugged into the camera or the SD Card is not writable.
body.stoprecrebootconfirm: Do you want to disable recording and reboot?
body.backupconfirm: Do you want to backup files?
body.formatconfirm: Do you want to format SD Card?
body.name: Name
body.deleteconfirm: The selected file will be deleted, are you sure?
body.formatrecording: Camera is recording files to SD Card now, please stop recording before format it.
body.sdrecerr1: If you want to browse SD Card, please disable SD Card in
body.formaterrmsg: File system of SD Card is corrupt. Please follow the instruction below to recover.
body.recorderr2: Backup recorded files and reformat SD Card ,or SD Card recording might fail easily.
body.recorderr3: After step2, you can go to
body.formaterrmsg2: Please doing the following steps after the camara rebooted:
body.reboot1: Camera has been reboot, please wait for
body.initstep: SD Card is not reinitialized. Please do the following steps to reinitialize SD Card.
body.initstep1: All data in SD Card will be erased. Please backup data in SD Card, before reinitializing SD Card.
body.over4Gstep0: The capacity of first partition of SD Card can not over 16G. Please do 'Format SD Card' to create 16G partition and format.
body.over4Gstep1: All data in SD Card will be erased. Please backup data in SD Card, before formating SD Card.
body.over4Gstep2: If SD Card size over 16G. The SD Card will create 16G partition and may not able to recover original size.
body.formatconfirm: Do you want to format SD Card ?
body.sdRecording: To format the SD Card in the camera, please disable SD Recording first.

hint.description1: Click this button to automatically format the SD Card and create folder for snapshot and video. To format SD Card, you need to disable SD Recording first.
hint.description2: If the recorded files are stored on the SD Card,click on the recorded folder and choose the recorded file you would like to view.
hint.description3: If video files are stored on the SD Card, click on the video folder and choose the video file you would like to view.
hint.description4: Reloads the file and folder information from the SD Card.
hint.sdcardpath1: This can indicate the current path of SD Card.
hint.sdstatus1: This can indicate the current SD Card status (whether it is inserted or detected).
hint.filesperpage1: The number of files per page.
hint.pages1: You can select which page to display here.
hint.total1: The total capability of SD Card.
hint.used1: The used capability of SD Card.
hint.free1: The free capability of SD Card.
